metadata.name: codeGirl : 1a
metadata.description:
"My name is Ellie Douglass  
or L.E.D. as my friends call me. 
(Ellie D = LED get it?  )  
Iâ€™m a 16 year old, NYC high school junior  
And this is the story of how I came to rule the world."

STORY:  
This is section 1a of codeGirl  
(An interactive graphic novel I wrote for the Tribeca Film Festival).

CODE:  
You can Rotate & Zoom to change the point of view  
with any IO: mouse | trackpad | touchscreen | controllers. 

I put this story into my design systems for the blockchain, which I call StoryBlox & FlipBooks.  
These are spatial and responsive narrative systems I build that move back and forth between screens / XR & future holographic displays.  
These stand-alone storyBlox also link together to create the larger narrative.  
Further, this work can change and update over time, allowing the story, how it looks and functions to grow & evolve as well.

DESIGN:  
I have built most of these assets by hand in VR.
